item.title: Demographic Bias in Model Design and Big Tech
item.description: In today’s weekly CSS Workshop, we had a duo from AirBnB presenting work on ‘Designing for Trust’ in the context of the sharing economy.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Testing what this looks like. Ideally, I’d be able to do a whole new layout for the about page. Let’s see.
Adarsh Mathew Hi! I’m currently a graduate student in the Masters in Computational Social Science program at the University of Chicago.
